This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen, separate living room with natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, and renovated bathroom.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!

details.description:
Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new fabulous 2-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Stainless steel appliances

Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

details.description: Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's and more! Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. details.description:
Welcome to 119 Albany Ave, a beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment located in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Crown Heights North. This meticulously updated unit offers modern and stylish finishes, creating a contemporary living space for your comfort and enjoyment.
Step inside to discover a thoughtfully designed interior that showcases a seamless blend of classic and contemporary elements. The apartment boasts updated stainless steel appliances, adding a touch of elegance and functionality to the well-appointed kitchen. The hardwood floors throughout the unit enhance the overall aesthetic appeal and provide a warm ambiance.
The queen-sized bedroom offers a peaceful retreat with ample space for relaxation and rest. The central air conditioning ensures optimal comfort during all seasons, allowing you to create the perfect indoor environment. Additionally, the apartment features the timeless charm of exposed brick walls, adding character and a unique touch to the living space.
Convenience is at your fingertips with laundry facilities conveniently located within the building, saving you time and effort. Furthermore, this pet-friendly apartment welcomes your furry companions, making it a great option for pet owners.
The prime location of 119 Albany Ave provides easy access to transportation options, including the nearby subway stations, allowing for a hassle-free commute to other parts of Brooklyn and beyond. Additionally, the neighborhood is dotted with an array of excellent eateries, offering a diverse range of culinary delights to explore.
One of the most enticing aspects of this apartment is that there is no broker fee, ensuring a straightforward rental process. Guarantors are also welcome, providing flexibility for those who may require additional support during the application process. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make 119 Albany Ave your new home. Available starting July 1st, this beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment offers modern comforts, convenient amenities, and a fantastic location in vibrant Crown Heights North.

Super sunny W/D in unit Queen-sized bedroom Big living room with windows, south facing Renovated kitchen, complete with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and microwave High ceilings Exposed brick
No broker fee Available 6-1

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit
